title: #280: American Murder: The Family Next Door, Part 3
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa continue to discuss the #1 Netflix show about the murders of Shanann, Bella, Celeste and Nico Watts.



Jim and Laura continue to deconstruct Chris Watt's behaviour and events leading up to the horrific events of August 13 2018.



Warning: This is an extremely upsetting watch and case and this series is a tough listen.



Our thoughts are with Shanann's, Bella and Celeste's family and friends.



#HerNameWasShanannWatts

#HerNameWas BellaWatts

#HerNameWasCelesteWatts

#HisNameWasNicoWatts

#CoerciveControl

#DomesticViolenceAwarenessMonth

#netflix, #americanmurder #familynextdoor


Please be an activist:

Please SIGN and SHARE the petition to criminalise coercive control in America

https://www.change.org/p/andrew-m-cuomo-domestic-violence-law-reform-coercive-control-usa?redirect=false



If you are or have been a victim of domestic abuse, please take two minutes to COMPLETE this anonymous survey. Your voice matters and counts

https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/JCYVVZD



WRITE to your senator and ask that they take action and criminalize coercive control to protect women and children.
